text: Pogonocherus sieversi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Ganglbauer in 1886. It is known from Georgia, Turkey, Armenia and Ukraine.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus sieversi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1886
title: Pogonocherus sieversi
